title: Axiomatic Constraint Input Structure Validation Schema (CIVS)
description: Defines the mandatory structural requirements for all GAX-owned configuration files (ACVD, UFRM, CFTM) to ensure they conform to expected YAML/JSON structure prior to ingestion by GSEP-C stages S03/S04.

mandatory_constraints.description: List or structure containing mandatory policy fields (must be non-empty).

required_types.description: Mapping of configuration variables to their required canonical data types (e.g., UFRM: number, PVLM_bound: boolean).
